title: Makar Sankranti
details: Celebrate the harvest festival with special prayers to Lord Surya and distribution of sacred khichdi prasadam to all devotees.

title: Republic Day Celebrations
details: Patriotic celebration with flag hoisting ceremony followed by cultural performances by temple community members.

title: Vasant Panchami
details: Welcome spring with Goddess Saraswati worship. Special prayers for students and blessing of books and musical instruments.

title: Maha Shivaratri
details: Grand celebration of Lord Shiva with continuous abhishek, bhajans, and meditation throughout the night.

title: Holi Celebration
description: Festival of colors with community gathering
details: Celebrate the victory of good over evil with colors, music, dance, and special Krishna bhajans.

title: Ram Navami
details: Celebrate Lord Rama's birth with special prayers, Ramayana recitation, and community feast.
